product_title: Logitech G Yeti GX Dynamic RGB Gaming Microphone, Podcast Microphone with LIGHTSYNC, Blue VO!CE, G HUB Control, USB Plug and Play - Black
about_product: Smart Audio Lock: smartly adjusts your gain by using an analog limiter to prevent clipping and a downward expander to reduce ambient background noise; suitable as a usb microphone and microphone for pc.

Be dynamic: Yeti GX is an RGB microphone powered by LIGHTSYNC, with a custom dynamic capsule and advanced software that deliver serious audio performance via USB, suitable as a Logitech mic or desktop mic.

Dynamic mic capsule: Designed for gamers, the new broadcast-style dynamic mic capsule uses a supercardioid pattern that ignores key clicks, focusing on your voice. It serves well as a gaming microphone pc and streaming microphone.

Blue VO.CE filters and effects: Enable Smart Audio Lock and other studio tools; add Blue VO.CE filters, effects, samples to enhance your stream using this Yeti microphone and studio microphone for engaging content.

Dual RGB zones: Use LIGHTSYNC to control two separate RGB light zones on the Logitech microphone and sync with other Logitech G gaming gear in G HUB for a fully immersive experience. Works as a microphone for podcast too.
product_description: Yeti GX is a premium RGB desk microphone powered by LIGHTSYNC and designed specifically for game streamers. This microphone, featuring a custom dynamic capsule with advanced software, functions as a microphone USB to reject noise and key clicks, improve your sound and ensure consistent high-quality audio while you stream. It is suitable for those looking for a great microphone for podcasting, as it can be used as a microphone podcast device with ease. Use LIGHTSYNC to control two separate RGB light zones on the mic and sync them with other G gear in G HUB, such as a pc microphone and keyboards, for a fully immersive experience. Add fun vocal effects with Blue VO!CE software, and use Smart Audio Lock or set the gain manually with easy on-mic controls. This dynamic microphone is a valuable addition to your recording microphones & accessories, offering the versatility needed for a seamless experience. Ideal as a YouTube microphone or a computer microphone, it works well for any content creator. For those seeking a micrófono para podcast or podcast mics, the Yeti GX is a great choice for recording sessions.

product_details.Special Feature: Gaming, RGB Lighting, Custom Dynamic Capsule, Advanced Software, Blue VO.CE filters and effects

customers_say: Customers find the microphone's sound quality excellent, with customizable audio effects and clear voice recording, while appreciating its professional-grade construction and ease of use, with one noting the simple-to-use buttons. The microphone effectively cancels noise, is easy to set up, and looks good, with customers praising its versatile features. While some customers consider it great value for money, others feel it's not worth the price.

top_reviews.review_comment: **Logitech G Yeti GX Dynamic RGB Gaming Microphone Review** **Audio Quality: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐** The audio quality is exceptional and sounds very professional. Whether you're streaming, gaming, or recording content, this microphone delivers clear, crisp sound that rivals much more expensive equipment. **Software & Functionality: ⭐⭐⭐⭐** The companion software offers extensive customization options for audio settings, giving you plenty of control over your sound profile. While it includes features like voice cloning, these aren't particularly practical for everyday use. However, the core functionality is excellent and works seamlessly with third-party software like NVIDIA's noise cancellation tools. **Build Quality: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐** The microphone feels genuinely professional-grade with solid construction throughout. It's well-built and designed to last, which you can feel immediately when handling it. **Size & Setup: ⭐⭐⭐⭐** The size is manageable and works great both on a desk setup and mounted on an arm. The footprint isn't too large, making it suitable for various workspace configurations. **Value for Money: ⭐⭐⭐⭐** Considering the professional audio quality and robust build, this microphone offers solid value. You're getting performance that competes with higher-end mics at a more accessible price point. **Overall:** This is an amazing microphone that delivers professional results. The combination of excellent audio quality, comprehensive software control, and solid build quality makes it a great choice for gamers, streamers, and content creators looking for reliable performance.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: This is a solid microphone that delivers good value for the price. The easy-to-use mute feature is a standout, and setup was essentially plug-and-play. My friends could hear me clearly with no issues, and the performance is about what you’d expect from Logitech at this price point—reliable and straightforward.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I did not know how to much of a difference an actual mic can have on the audio quality. This device is sturdy and the sound qualify is great. Great value for the money!
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Bought for our 12 year old daughter who wanted to comment on video games. Everyone dreams of being a V-Blogger. It was easy to assemble (compared to the very complex assembly this replaced). Doesn't take up much space and sounds great. Can drown out surrounding noise. Pricey, but worth it.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I purchased this to replace my quadcast as it stopped working after only couple of years. Sound quality seems comparable as I don't notice any difference to my ears but G Hub makes it much easier to make additional adjustments. Only negative compared to my quadcast is that there is no indication when you mute the mic. In addition, mute button is not as easy to press compared to quadcast. Overall, it's a great mic but I do wish I had an option to change the light when the mic is in mute.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Great quality audio and awesome level control
top_reviews.review_comment: The Logitech G Yeti GX Dynamic RGB Gaming Microphone is a game-changer for gamers, streamers, and podcasters alike. Straight out of the box, it offers exceptional sound quality thanks to its dynamic supercardioid pickup pattern, which captures crisp and clear audio while effectively eliminating background noise. The integration of Blue VO!CE technology is a standout feature, providing customizable audio effects and presets for enhanced sound without requiring additional software. The RGB lighting with LIGHTSYNC adds a visually stunning element, syncing seamlessly with your gaming setup for an immersive experience. The microphone’s USB plug-and-play functionality makes it incredibly easy to set up and start using, even for beginners. The build quality is top-notch, with a sturdy yet sleek design that looks professional and feels durable. Another highlight is the compatibility with Logitech’s G HUB software, which provides intuitive control over audio settings and lighting customization. Whether you’re streaming on Twitch, recording a podcast, or just communicating with your team in-game, the Yeti GX delivers reliable performance with minimal effort. If you’re looking for a microphone that combines professional-grade audio quality, aesthetic appeal, and ease of use, the Logitech G Yeti GX is a stellar choice. While the Logitech G Yeti GX Dynamic RGB Gaming Microphone has many excellent features, there are a few drawbacks that hold it back from perfection. The G HUB software, while powerful, can be overwhelming for new users and occasionally buggy, requiring patience to navigate. Overall, while the Yeti GX offers outstanding audio quality and aesthetics.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023

top_reviews.review_title: Really great for my home office
top_reviews.review_comment: My use case for this is 99% home office oriented. I was tired of dealing with headsets and every USB speakerphone I tried resulted in crappy voice quality, so I took the plunge on this a week ago. It matches my other Logitech gear (keyboard, mouse, webcam), and people have commented very positively on the audio quality on their end of calls. I am really amazed at how it filters out background noise…I did a test call with music blaring three feet away and it still captured only my voice So now, I have my perfect home office - just the microphone plus external speakers. No more headsets, speakerphones, or earbuds. Awesome! Only downside is that G Hub isn’t working with it on my MacBook - says there’s a driver problem and Logitech hasn’t been able to help yet. It still functions fine but I can’t use the Blue Voice features. If I plug it into my Windows box, G Hub is fine.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2024

top_reviews_global.review_title: was worried but received it perfectly

top_reviews_global.review_comment: This product stopped working after 2 weeks and the RGB on the back is the dumbest thing i have ever used on a MIC. DO NOT BUY . For the price of this mic just spend more money and buy the SHURE MV7 USB.
